Binta Masi Garba (amụrụ 17 Eprel, 1967) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria, nwanyị ọchụnta ego na onye nchịkwa, na-eje ozi dị ka Senator Adamawa North Senatorial District of Adamawa State kemgbe 2015
Ọ jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche, Adamawa State isi nke All Progressives Congress na ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ onye isi oche steeti nke nnukwu otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Nigeria
Binta jere ozi n'ụlọ omebe iwu Federal ugboro atọ, site na 1999 ruo 2011

Ọ bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mbụ na-anọchite anya Federal abụọ dị iche iche na 2009, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi oche mbụ nke ndị omebe iwu Commonwealth Women Parliamentarians (CWP) n'okpuru Commonwealth Parliamentary Association (CPA) na Cameroon
Ọ bụ naanị nwanyị Sịnetọ-ahọpụtara na steeti iri na itoolu n'ebe ugwu Naijiria na ntuliaka 2015
Ọ bụkwa naanị nwanyị si Adamawa steeti gara mba ọgbakọ n'Abuja.
Binta Masi Garba mụrụ na Kaduna Army Barrack site na nne na nna Alakụba
Nne na nna ya bụ Higgi si Bazza, Michika Local Government Area nke Adamawa State
Nna ya Mr Garba Tumba bụ onye isi ndị agha
Ọ bụ nwa nke abụọ, ya mere akpọrọ ya Masi dịka mgbakọ ọdịnala Higgi siri dị
N'agbata 1975 na 1981, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Army Children, New Cantonment D, Hayin Banki, Kaduna
O si ebe ahụ gawa akwụkwọ sekọndrị wee nweta  (GCE/WAEC 'O' Level) ya  na Government Day School, Kurmin Mashi, Kaduna South, Kaduna, n'agbata 1981 na 1987
Ọ gara Kaduna Polytechnic wee nweta Diploma National (OND Marketing, 1990) na Higher National Diploma (HND Marketing, 1997)
N'afọ 2004, ọ gara Harvard Kennedy School of Government - Harvard University (Public Financial Management)
O nwetara diploma abụọ na Theology site na Bible School of Church Growth and Practical Ministry, na Matthew Owujaye's Ministry, Kaduna
Ọ bụ onye nnata nke nzere Doctorate Honorary na Theology sitere na Mahadum Smith Christian, Miami, Florida.
Binta Masi Garba malitere ọrụ ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ya n'afọ 1998 na Kaduna, Nigeria
Tupu mgbe ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na New Nigeria Newspapers dị ka onye ọrụ mgbasa ozi, afọ o ruru maka nkwalite enyeghị ya n'ihi ahaghị nhata nke nwoke na nwanyị
Binta Masi Garba na-akwado mgbe niile maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị; nke a mere ka o were ọrụ ịnọchite anya ha n'ụlọomeiwu Federal House of representatives Kaduna South Federal Constituency

N'oge na-adịghị anya site na ahụmahụ enweghị ahaghị nhata nwoke na nwanyị ahụ, o kpebiri itinye aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na 1998 na Kaduna South Federal Constituency, ebe omenala na-emekarị na-amachibidoro ụmụ nwanyị ịnọ n'ọchịchị ọha
Ikere mbụ ya na 1998 emeghị nke ọma
ọ zọọrọ ọzọ na 1999 maka ụlọ ọrụ nke Federal House of Representatives wee merie ya na 5,000 votes
Ọ bụ onye omebe iwu Federal nke ọdụdụ na Naijiria kacha nta na 1999
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ nke ọma nke mbụ, ọ zọọrọ ọzọ na 2003 wee merie onye iro ya na oke nke na-erughị 50,000

N'afọ 2006, ka ọ na-erule njedebe nke ugboro abụọ ya na Ụlọ Ndị Nnọchiteanya Federal, Gọvanọ Adamawa State n'oge ahụ, Boni Haruna, mgbe ahụ nụrụ maka ọmarịcha ọrụ ya dị ka onye omebe iwu na-anọchite anya Kaduna South, rịọrọ ya ka ọ laghachite na steeti ya si, Adamawa State, bia zo asọmpi
Ka o mechachara ndụmọdụ, o kwetara wee gbadata ịzọ ọkwa maka ụlọ omebe iwu na Madagali/Michika Federal Constituency n'okpuru PDP
O mechara nweta oche ahụ wee nọchite anya mpaghara ntuliaka site na 2007 ruo 2011

Mgbe ntuli aka nke 2011 gasịrị, ụlọ ọrụ International Republican Institute mere ihe nkiri, "Dreams for Nigeria", banyere ndị isi ụmụ nwanyị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria na Garba bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị a họpụtara
Ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ bụ Hon
Suleiman Oba Nimota, Adamawa State; Hon
Saudatu Sani, Kaduna State; Hon
Titi Akindahunsi, Ekiti State, Hon
Maimuna Adaji, Kwara State, Hon
Florence Akinwale, Ekiti State and Hon
Beni Lar, Plateau State
Mgbe ọ nọsịrị n'ọkwa nke atọ n'usoro nke atọ na Ụlọ Nzukọ Omeiwu Federal, ọ zọgharịrị ọzọ wee merie Titsi Ganama
Ndị People's Democratic Party (PDP) n'okpuru onyeisi oche Bamanga Tukur nwere nnukwu nsogbu ọchịchị na otu ọhụrụ pụtara na 2013
Otu ọhụrụ nke PDP nọ n'okpuru onyeisi oche nke Abubakar Kawu Baraje
Otu ọhụrụ a ka a kpọrọ PDP ọhụrụ (nPDP)
A họpụtara Binta Masi Garba ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi umu nwanyị nPDP
O mechara banye All Progressive Congress (APC) tinyere Gọvanọ Murtala Nyako na ndị Gọvanọ ndị ọzọ
Ọ zọọrọ wee pụta dịka onyeisi oche nke Adamawa State Chapter na APC
Mmeri e nwetara na ntuliaka ahụ mere ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche steeti mbụ nke bu nwanyi na nnukwu otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị debanyere aha na Naijiria
Esemokwu metụtara ntuli aka nke Adamawa State Chapter of APC Executives ntuli aka fọrọ nke nta ka ọ daa otu ahụ

Binta Masi Garba gbasiri mbọ ike ka otu pati ahụ dị n'otu na steeti Adamawa Ọ lekọtara otu n'ime primaries pati kacha aga nke ọma na Adamawa steeti dịka oche onye isi oche nke APC Adamawa State Chapter
Enyere ya ohere ịzọ ọkwa maka oche Sineti na primaries pati ma mechaa nwee mmeri megide onye na-asọ mpi ya
Na 28 May 2015, o meriri oche Senate nke Adamawa North Senatorial District site na imeri na mpaghara atọ nke mpaghara ise LGA na mpaghara ahụ.
Enwere ihe karịrị 100 ndị Sineti ahọpụtara na Mgbakọ Mba nke asatọ, mana naanị isii n'ime ndị a bụ ụmụ nwanyị
Ndị ọzọ bụ Monsurat Sunmonu sitere na steeti Oyo, Stella Oduah na Uche Ekwunife bụ ndị na-anọchite anya Anambra, Fatimat Raji Rasaki, Oluremi Tinubu na Rose Okoji Oko
Binta Masi Garba emeriela ọtụtụ ihe nrite, ha gụnyere:
Àtụ:Nigerian Senators of the 8th National Assembly
